description: The `mother` of Midarezaki family. She is twenty years old, however, she has an appearance of a little girl with cat`s ear and tail. Her real name is `Kyoukya Eaeriaea`, and she used to be worshiped by the people of an underground kingdom named `Shangri-la`, however, she ran away because she felt something was missing from her life.
name: Midarezaki Kyouka
